categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Rion was a male Corellian living during the time of the Galactic Civil War, and was in opposition to the rule of the Galactic Empire.
Rion became one of the leaders of the Rebel cells on Corellia. Bria Tharen worked at the rebel headquarters on Corellia, and was able to obtain information on the rebels through Rion.
